reviewText: Marilyn Henrion is cool.  I was inspired by her story.  I always feel a bit jealous hearing about all the interesting artsy people who were hanging out in New York during the 50s and 60s.  She has enjoyed many interesting friendships, and I loved hearing about all the cool folks her kids were growing up around.  Henrion's work is very, very unique.  Even if you are not a quilt person, which I'm not, you have to give her lots of credit for innovation and composition.  Truly fascinating pieces.

The video is visually stunning and an amazing presentation of the breadth of Marilyn's work.  Interwoven with poetry and music, it provides insight into her influences and history.  An authentic artist.
